content: jingle bell stocking materials red heart™ holiday yarn 1 skein each of red green and white crochet hooks size j & size k substitute larger hooks if you want a larger stocking 12 medium jingle bells small crochet hook or bent paper clip abbreviations chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch double_crochet = double_crochet popcorn = popcorn directions all rounds are worked with right side facing with green chain 5 slip_stitch in 5th chain from hook to form ring round 1 chain 3 work 15 double_crochet in ring slip_stitch in top of chain-3 fasten yarn round 2 attach white chain 3 in next st work a 5-double_crochet popcorn double_crochet in next st * popcorn in next st double_crochet in next st repeat from * around slip_stitch in top of starting chain-3 fasten yarn you should have 8 popcorns round 3 attach red in top of any popcorn chain 3 in same space work double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet * double_crochet in next st double_crochet in top of next popcorn double_crochet in next st work 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in top of next popcorn repeat from * around ending with slip_stitch in top of starting chain-3 round 4 -
